html:
11.21.19  1:03 am   Is the milk in cereal a broth, sauce, dressing, or something else? I need to know.

      bath

11.21.19  1:00 am   Will you make more videos?

      of course

11.21.19  12:49 am   I think your doing a fucking amazing job

      that's nice of you

11.21.19  12:44 am   this is the egg man again, it is my goal to appear here as much as possible.

why is your music the way it is

      that is due to the reflexive property of equality

11.21.19  12:18 am   Is it easy to spot first time visitors based on the questions they ask? 

      often

11.20.19  11:56 pm   11.19.19  9:07 pm if you implemented the sky as a world node setup then you could make it in a file then save that file (along with any other material or world node presets) as the default startup file, then every new file you make after that will have your presets in it

      i did that but it disappeared after a day .... also with the amount of items and objects i would like to have saved, i would think that file would get pretty huge and slow to start up?

11.20.19  11:53 pm   What is your favorite song today?

      the 60hz electrical hum

11.20.19  11:47 pm   Do you find some questions that people ask rather presumptuous? 

      yes

11.20.19  11:32 pm   how many voices are in your head?

      as many as i can imagine

11.20.19  11:30 pm   do you get flustered when people say mean things to you

      yes

11.20.19  10:44 pm   are the time stamps on these questions from when it was answered or when it was asked

      asked

11.20.19  10:38 pm   trying to figure out where to upload my clips. i have clips of my life and i dont really wanna post them on social media where my friends and coworkers can see. i like your idea of having a website and just putting them there and seeing if anyone will ever find the videos/other content or even care. i'm thinking of just putting them in a folder and pretending i'm uploading them and then figuring out what to do with them later. i dunno i'm still trying to figure this one out. i guess as long as i have the clips it's ok, but some reason i'm desperate to upload them and feel like it's real and official cause they're out in the world. was it a good feeling for you when you set up your site?

     yes!!

      heavily considering it for myself just to have a space to go crazy publicly but also not so publicly at the same time, like posting on social media but i have total control over everything

11.20.19  10:28 pm   Some good conversation starters?

      hey guys, welcome to this conversation

11.20.19  10:24 pm   I am cerantily writing a Fantasy book, do you have any thing I should add into it?

      pages! make them fly out of the book if you can

11.20.19  10:11 pm   Do you believe giraffes exist?

      i want to believe

11.20.19  10:06 pm   I really like your music, will you make a song on the art of song

      i feel like i've done that before

11.20.19  9:54 pm   Ever think about making some sort of ARG?

      yes

11.20.19  9:54 pm   i didnt have enough time to finish this question. what should i do?

      panic, for sure

11.20.19  9:52 pm   when you produced content that turned out to be really popular, did you think while producing it 'this will be really popular I bet'

or was it a total surprise

or somewhere in between, and if so roughly where?

      i always knew it could, with a little persistence

11.20.19  9:23 pm   Another day I might ask you a question

      ok

11.20.19  9:08 pm   do you care what kind of questions you get

      every kind of question presents a unique challenge, which is good

11.20.19  8:33 pm   advice on how to be less sad?

      the only way is to find someone more sad than you, so then immediately you will be less sad than them, but it doesn't end there, then you could help make them less sad which may or may not work but it will definitely make you less sad than you were before

11.20.19  8:24 pm   What kind of question should I ask you?

      what kind of answer would you like to receive

11.20.19  8:21 pm   11.19.19  9:05 pm   
Ugh seriously. There are creators that think COPPA is the end of animation and gaming on YouTube. I think the internet is only getting warmed up and the best years are still ahead. We are just figuring it all out right now, you know? These are the days our children will look back on and think, "dang those were exciting times I wish I could have experienced them." Do you agree?

      yes

11.20.19  8:21 pm   Have you ever travelled to cool places

      doing that now, well actually this one is a hot place

11.20.19  8:18 pm   i have a song idea and i have the chords in my head but i can't seem to figure out what they are. how do i figure it out

      this is just something you learn from experience. listen to a lot of songs, and learn them, and after a few years you will be able to find chords even from just a melody. for now, if you want to send me the melody i could probably figure out what chords it's supposed to be

11.20.19  8:11 pm   can you help with binomial distribution in my introduction to statistics class?

      i think i could but i forgot what that means

11.20.19  8:01 pm   how is it possible that cells multiply by dividing?

      they have instructions for how to build themselves written inside themselves. where they get the building material, i'm not sure. maybe by peeing or something

11.20.19  7:43 pm   hi bill what should I do if there are Hostile people outside the place where I live and they make noise outside of my door and I can't sleep? I can't exact my revenge by making noise so they can't sleep, because they do not seem to value sleep as I do. :(

      you could record it and animate cartoons to go along with it

11.20.19  7:34 pm   why cant anything just stop doing what it is

      could be an addiction

11.20.19  7:22 pm   will you adopt me

      again?

11.20.19  7:13 pm   So uhhh I had a bad day what should I do 

      how about doing a motion picture

11.20.19  6:44 pm   you ever feel like eating a grilled cheese

      yes

11.20.19  6:24 pm   What's something that no one is doing right now

      going to the moon

11.20.19  6:18 pm   how do you play songs by ear?

      i'm not sure. it's similar to saying sentences that you've heard. it's one of the strange miracles of the human mind

11.20.19  6:17 pm   Why do a lot of your songs have lyrics that say stuff like "sent me to jail"?

      i don't know. i will be discussing it with my therapist who both fortunately and unfortunately is me

11.20.19  5:24 pm   I learned blender 2.8 what should I model

      yourself modeling something. don't forget to animate it too

11.20.19  5:20 pm   Do you think it will be better for world if human race vanish? 

      not really

11.20.19  4:52 pm   What's your favorite flower?

      got to be one of the purple ones

11.20.19  4:29 pm   does digestion start in the mouth?

      it actually begins in the stars

11.20.19  4:18 pm   What do you think about the act of walking being just us people and animals constantly pulling our body parts up just to let them fall a bit more away from us?

      i think you are missing the larger picture, and the forward progress that occurs

11.20.19  4:08 pm   What's your favorite texture?

      rough

11.20.19  4:07 pm   have you thought about constant-livestreaming the countdown timer? 

      that sounds like fun, but i think this one might be at its strongest point when it is left to the vivid whimsy of imagination

11.20.19  3:35 pm   I have a job interview this evening. Any tips on how to make a good impression?

      the impression is not nearly is important as what you actually do once you are hired. that's what they are actually interested in. but i suppose the only way to figure out what will actually happen once you are hired, is to interview them a little

11.20.19  3:33 pm   If a study the effects your songs had on the brain, what do you think the effects would be?

      traumatizing

11.20.19  3:21 pm   what genre is your music?

      songs

11.20.19  2:47 pm   How do i not procrastinate

      first you must stop using the word 'procrastinate.' it's a very long word and it wastes a lot of time

11.20.19  2:45 pm   What else will you add to your website later on?

     more behind the scenes material, more test fragments and examples, maybe a talk show, ....also much more content added to the existing pages

      Will you update anything on your website?

     i always do

11.20.19  2:17 pm   Are you gonna answer this question seriously?

      sure, if you ask it seriously

11.20.19  2:15 pm   What is Ice Butter

     probably a rectangular prism that changes color

      and how do you create it?

      probably make a cube, scale it on 1 axis, maybe keyframe it at 2 slightly different sizes (and rotational positions) over time, then if you can't figure out how to keyframe color changes, you could export 2 different renders, one of each color, and then bring it into a regular video editing/compositing program and then stack the 2 clips, make a vertical cut down both, delete the first half of the first clip and the second half of the second clip, then put them on the same track and crossfade them
